WorkItem.ClosedComment: Duplicate, ElitistArmory is down, no ETA on fix
WorkItem.Description:
I can't view any data on my character by loading from the armory because it never loads :(
 
Repro steps:
Launch Rawr
File->Load from Armory
Select US, Nordrassil, Kirann
Leave Force Refresh unchecked or check it - repros both ways
Hit OK
Observe alternating "Queued (Position: -1)" alternates with "Downloading Character Data" but character load never progresses 
 
Repro machine:
64-bit Windows 7 Enterprise, RTM w/ all released patches
Silverlight v 4.0.50524.0 w/ increased storage limit
WorkItem.Summary: Load Character from Armory dialog box stays "Queued (Position: -1)" forever

Comments.Message: Reroute Armory queries back to the actual WoW-Armory like Rawr2 does?
There's a reason we didn't do that in the first place
